resources.string: Amicus certus in re incerta cernitur.

If Hell is other people, thought Shadow, then Purgatory is airports.
If you don\'t know anything about computers, just remember that they are machines that do exactly what you tell them but often surprise you in the result.
The only legitimate use of a computer is to play games.

The greatest failure is not to try.
To err is human, but being right is nice too.
If you want to change the way people respond to you, change the way you respond to people.
